entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
